Fishers.Tornado outbreak of April 27\u201328, 20:
The Tornado outbreak of April 27-28, 2002 was a widespread outbreak that afectted areas of Iowa, Kansas, Missouri and Nebraska were affected on April 27. More tornadoes were reported in Illinois, Indiana, Kentucky, Maryland, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Tennessee, Virginia and West Virginia on the following day, April 28.
Generally, tornado reports were widely scattered in each state, but significant to severe damage was noted in multiple states.
